actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Community Act of 1955, as amended, to authorize the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to make assistance payments to the Los Alamos School Board and the County of Los Alamos, New Mexico, after June 30, 1976, in the case of the schools and after June 30, 1977.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Community Act of 1955 to authorize the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to continue assistance payments to specified local governmental units in Los Alamos, New Mexico, beyond the deadline dates specified in such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Community Act of 1955, as amended, to authorize the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to make assistance payments to the Los Alamos School Board and the County of Los Alamos, New Mexico, after June 30, 1976, in the case of the schools and after June 30, 1977.
